# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="dd41e-102">Phím tắt trong Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dd41e-103">Trong Outlook.com bạn có thể sử dụng các phím tắt tương tự như dịch vụ email bạn đang sử dụng để làm việc với, chẳng hạn như Gmail, Yahoo Mail, hoặc Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dd41e-104">Đi tới [cài đặt trợ năng](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="dd41e-105">**Cài đặt**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="dd41e-106">**Xem tất cả cài đặt** > Outlook**General** > **Accessibility**) và chọn các phím tắt mà bạn muốn sử dụng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="dd41e-107">Để xem danh sách phím tắt đầy đủ, hãy xem [Outlook.com phím tắt](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="dd41e-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
